physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Crusted skin lesions on the dorsum of the hands and the forearms, increased heart rate, irregular heart rhythm, suppurative superficial thrombophlebitis, blistering skin lesions on dorsal bilateral upper extremities.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially unremarkable physical examination findings deteriorated with an increased heart rate and the development of atrial fibrillation and skin lesions.
